original: Majjhima Nikāya 64
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Mahāmālukyasutta
analyzed: mahāmālukyasutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “bhikkhavo”ti.
analyzed: bhikkhavaḥ ti

original: “Bhadante”ti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: bhadanta iti te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ

original: Bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: bhagavān etat avoca

original: “dhāretha no tumhe, bhikkhave, mayā desitāni pañcorambhāgiyāni saṁyojanānī”ti?
analyzed: dhāretha no tumhe bhikkhave mayā desitāni pañca orambhāgiyāni sayojanāni iti

original: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā mālukyaputto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte āyasmā mālukyaputtaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “ahaṁ kho, bhante, dhāremi bhagavatā desitāni pañcorambhāgiyāni saṁyojanānī”ti.
analyzed: aham kho bhante dhāremi bhagavatā desitāni pañca orambhāgiyāni sa yojanāni iti

original: “Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, mālukyaputta, dhāresi mayā desitāni pañcorambhāgiyāni saṁyojanānī”ti?
analyzed: yathā katham pana tva mālukyaputta dhāresi mayā desitāni pañca orambhāgiyāni sayojanāni iti

original: “Sakkāyadiṭṭhiṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, bhagavatā orambhāgiyaṁ saṁyojanaṁ desitaṁ dhāremi;
analyzed: sakkāya diṭṭhim kho aha bhante bhagavatā orambhāgiyam sayojanam desitam dhāremi

original: vicikicchaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, bhagavatā orambhāgiyaṁ saṁyojanaṁ desitaṁ dhāremi;
analyzed: vicikiccham kho aha bhante bhagavatā orambhāgiyam sayojanam desitam dhāremi

original: sīlabbataparāmāsaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, bhagavatā orambhāgiyaṁ saṁyojanaṁ desitaṁ dhāremi;
analyzed: sīlabbata parāmāsam kho aha bhante bhagavatā orambhāgiyam sayojanam desitam dhāremi

original: kāmacchandaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, bhagavatā orambhāgiyaṁ saṁyojanaṁ desitaṁ dhāremi;
analyzed: kāmacchandam kho aha bhante bhagavatā orambhāgiyam sayojanam desitam dhāremi

original: byāpādaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, bhagavatā orambhāgiyaṁ saṁyojanaṁ desitaṁ dhāremi.
analyzed: byāpādam kho aha bhante bhagavatā orambhāgiyam sayojanam desitam dhāremi

original: Evaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, dhāremi bhagavatā desitāni pañcorambhāgiyāni saṁyojanānī”ti.
analyzed: evam kho aha bhante dhāremi bhagavatā desitāni pañca orambhāgiyāni sa yojanāni iti

original: “Kassa kho nāma tvaṁ, mālukyaputta, imāni evaṁ pañcorambhāgiyāni saṁyojanāni desitāni dhāresi?
analyzed: kassa kho nāma tva mālukyaputta imāni evam pañca urambhāgiyāni sayojanāni desitāni dhāresi

original: Nanu, mālukyaputta, aññatitthiyā paribbājakā iminā taruṇūpamena upārambhena upārambhissanti?
analyzed: nanu mālukyaputta añña titthiyāḥ paribbājakāḥ iminā taruṇūpamena upārambhena upārambhissanti

original: Daharassa hi, mālukyaputta, kumārassa mandassa uttānaseyyakassa sakkāyotipi na hoti, kuto panassa uppajjissati sakkāyadiṭṭhi?
analyzed: daharassa hi mālukyaputta kumārassa mandassa uttānaseyyakassa na hoti kutas panassa uppajjissati sakkāya diṭṭhi

original: Anusetvevassa sakkāyadiṭṭhānusayo.
analyzed: sakkāya diṭṭha anusayo

original: Daharassa hi, mālukyaputta, kumārassa mandassa uttānaseyyakassa dhammātipi na hoti, kuto panassa uppajjissati dhammesu vicikicchā?
analyzed: daharassa hi mālukyaputta kumārassa mandassa uttānaseyyakassa dhamma atipi na hoti kutas panassa uppajjissati dhammesu vicikicchā

original: Anusetvevassa vicikicchānusayo.
analyzed: vicikicchā anusayaḥ

original: Daharassa hi, mālukyaputta, kumārassa mandassa uttānaseyyakassa sīlātipi na hoti, kuto panassa uppajjissati sīlesu sīlabbataparāmāso?
analyzed: daharassa hi mālukyaputta kumārassa mandassa uttānaseyyakassa sīla atipi na hoti kutas panassa uppajjissati sīlesu sīlabbata parāmāsaḥ

original: Anusetvevassa sīlabbataparāmāsānusayo.
analyzed: sīlabbata parāmāsa anusayaḥ

original: Daharassa hi, mālukyaputta, kumārassa mandassa uttānaseyyakassa kāmātipi na hoti, kuto panassa uppajjissati kāmesu kāmacchando?
analyzed: daharassa hi mālukyaputta kumārassa mandassa uttānaseyyakassa kāma atipi na hoti kutas panassa uppajjissati kāmesu kāmacchandaḥ

original: Anusetvevassa kāmarāgānusayo.
analyzed: anusetu eva assa kāma rāga anusayaḥ

original: Daharassa hi, mālukyaputta, kumārassa mandassa uttānaseyyakassa sattātipi na hoti, kuto panassa uppajjissati sattesu byāpādo?
analyzed: daharassa hi mālukyaputta kumārassa mandassa uttānaseyyakassa satta atipi na hoti kutas panassa uppajjissati sattesu byāpādaḥ

original: Anusetvevassa byāpādānusayo.
analyzed: byāpāda anusayaḥ

original: Nanu, mālukyaputta, aññatitthiyā paribbājakā iminā taruṇūpamena upārambhena upārambhissantī”ti?
analyzed: nanu mālukyaputta añña titthiyāḥ paribbājakāḥ iminā taruṇūpamena upārambhena upārambhissanti iti

original: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte āyasmai ānandaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “etassa, bhagavā, kālo, etassa, sugata, kālo
analyzed: etassa bhagavā kālaḥ etassa sugata kālaḥ

original: yaṁ bhagavā pañcorambhāgiyāni saṁyojanāni deseyya. Bhagavato sutvā bhikkhū dhāressantī”ti.
analyzed: yam bhagavā pañca orambhāgiyāni sayojanāni deseyya bhagavataḥ sutvā bhikkhū dhāressanti iti

original: “Tena hānanda, suṇāhi, sādhukaṁ manasi karohi; bhāsissāmī”ti.
analyzed: tena ha ānanda suṇāhi sādhukam manasi karohi bhāsissāmi iti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato paccassosi.
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho āyasmai ānandaḥ bhagavataḥ paccassosi

original: Bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: bhagavān etat avoca

original: “Idhānanda, assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṁ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto, sappurisānaṁ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto
analyzed: idha ānanda assutavā puthujjanaḥ ariyānam a dassāvī ariya dhammassa a kovidaḥ ariya dhamme a vinītaḥ sappurisānam a dassāvī sappurisa dhammassa a kovidaḥ sappurisa dhamme a vinītaḥ

original: sakkāyadiṭṭhipariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati sakkāyadiṭṭhiparetena;
analyzed: sakkāya diṭṭhi pariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati sakkāya diṭṭhi paretena

original: uppannāya ca sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā nissaraṇaṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti.
analyzed: uppannāya ca sakkāyadiṭṭhiyāḥ nissaraṇam yathābhūtam na pajānāti

original: Tassa sā sakkāyadiṭṭhi thāmagatā appaṭivinītā orambhāgiyaṁ saṁyojanaṁ.
analyzed: tassa sā sakkāya diṭṭhi thāma gatā appaṭivinītā orambhāgiyam sayojana

original: Vicikicchāpariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati vicikicchāparetena;
analyzed: vicikicchā pariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati vicikicchā paretena

original: uppannāya ca vicikicchāya nissaraṇaṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti.
analyzed: uppannāya ca vicikicchāya nissaraṇam yathābhūtam na ppajānāti

original: Tassa sā vicikicchā thāmagatā appaṭivinītā orambhāgiyaṁ saṁyojanaṁ.
analyzed: tassa sā vicikicchā thāma gatā appaṭivinītā orambhāgiyam sayojana

original: Sīlabbataparāmāsapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati sīlabbataparāmāsaparetena;
analyzed: sīlabbata parāmāsa pariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati sīlabbata parāmāsa paretena

original: uppannassa ca sīlabbataparāmāsassa nissaraṇaṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti.
analyzed: uppannassa ca sīlabbata parāmāsassa nissaraṇam yathābhūtam na pajānāti

original: Tassa so sīlabbataparāmāso thāmagato appaṭivinīto orambhāgiyaṁ saṁyojanaṁ.
analyzed: tassa so sīlabbata parāmāso thāma gataḥ appaṭivinītaḥ orambhāgiyam sayojana

original: Kāmarāgapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati kāmarāgaparetena;
analyzed: kāma rāga pariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati kāma rāga paretena

original: uppannassa ca kāmarāgassa nissaraṇaṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti.
analyzed: uppannassa ca kāma rāgassa nissaraṇam yathābhūtam na pajānāti

original: Tassa so kāmarāgo thāmagato appaṭivinīto orambhāgiyaṁ saṁyojanaṁ.
analyzed: tassa so kāma rāgaḥ thāma gataḥ appaṭivinītaḥ orambhāgiyam sayojana

original: Byāpādapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati byāpādaparetena;
analyzed: byāpāda pariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati byāpāda paretena

original: uppannassa ca byāpādassa nissaraṇaṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti.
analyzed: uppannassa ca byāpādassa nissaraṇam yathābhūtam na pajānāti

original: Tassa so byāpādo thāmagato appaṭivinīto orambhāgiyaṁ saṁyojanaṁ.
analyzed: tassa so byāpādaḥ thāma gataḥ appaṭivinītaḥ orambhāgiyam sayojana

original: Sutavā ca kho, ānanda, ariyasāvako ariyānaṁ dassāvī ariyadhammassa kovido ariyadhamme
analyzed: sutavā ca kho ānanda ariya sāvakaḥ ariyānam dassāvī ariya dhammassa kovidaḥ ariya dhamme

original: suvinīto, sappurisānaṁ dassāvī sappurisadhammassa kovido sappurisadhamme suvinīto
analyzed: su vinītaḥ sappurisānam dassāvī sappurisa dhammassa kovidaḥ sappurisa dhamme su vinītaḥ

original: na sakkāyadiṭṭhipariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati na sakkāyadiṭṭhiparetena;
analyzed: na sakkāya diṭṭhi pariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati na sakkāya diṭṭhi paretena

original: uppannāya ca sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā nissaraṇaṁ yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
analyzed: uppannāya ca sakkāyadiṭṭhiyāḥ nissaraṇam yathābhūtam pajānāti

original: Tassa sā sakkāyadiṭṭhi sānusayā pahīyati.
analyzed: tassa sā sakkāyadiṭṭhi sa anusayā pahīyati

original: Na vicikicchāpariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati na vicikicchāparetena;
analyzed: na vicikicchā pariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati na vicikicchā paretena

original: uppannāya ca vicikicchāya nissaraṇaṁ yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
analyzed: uppannāya ca vicikicchāya nissaraṇam yathābhūtam pajānāti

original: Tassa sā vicikicchā sānusayā pahīyati.
analyzed: tassa sā vicikicchā sa anusayā pahīyati

original: Na sīlabbataparāmāsapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati na sīlabbataparāmāsaparetena;
analyzed: na sīlabbata parāmāsa pariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati na sīlabbata parāmāsa paretena

original: uppannassa ca sīlabbataparāmāsassa nissaraṇaṁ yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
analyzed: uppannassa ca sīlabbata parāmāsassa nissaraṇam yathābhūtam pajānāti

original: Tassa so sīlabbataparāmāso sānusayo pahīyati.
analyzed: tassa so sīlabbata parāmāso sa anusayo pahīyati

original: Na kāmarāgapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati na kāmarāgaparetena;
analyzed: na kāma rāga pariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati na kāma rāga paretena

original: uppannassa ca kāmarāgassa nissaraṇaṁ yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
analyzed: uppannassa ca kāma rāgassa nissaraṇam yathābhūtam pajānāti

original: Tassa so kāmarāgo sānusayo pahīyati.
analyzed: tassa so kāma rāgaḥ sa anusayaḥ pahīyati

original: Na byāpādapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati na byāpādaparetena;
analyzed: na byāpāda pariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati na byāpāda paretena

original: uppannassa ca byāpādassa nissaraṇaṁ yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
analyzed: uppannassa ca byāpādassa nissaraṇam yathābhūtam pajānāti

original: Tassa so byāpādo sānusayo pahīyati.
analyzed: tassa saḥ byāpādaḥ sa anusayo pahīyati

original: Yo, ānanda, maggo yā paṭipadā pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ pahānāya taṁ
analyzed: yā ānanda maggaḥ yā paṭipadā pañcannam orambhāgiyānam sayojanānam pahānāya taṃ

original: maggaṁ taṁ paṭipadaṁ anāgamma pañcorambhāgiyāni saṁyojanāni ñassati vā dakkhati vā
analyzed: maggam tam paṭipadam an āgamma pañca orambhāgiyāni sayojanāni ñassati vā dakkhati vā

original: pajahissati vāti—netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: pajahissati vātinā itam ṭhānam vijjati

original: Seyyathāpi, ānanda, mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato tacaṁ acchetvā phegguṁ acchetvā sāracchedo bhavissatīti—
analyzed: seyyathā api ānanda mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravataḥ tacam acchetvā pheggum acchetvā sāra chedaḥ bhavissati iti

original: netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati;
analyzed: na itam ṭhānam vijjati

original: evameva kho, ānanda, yo maggo yā paṭipadā pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ pahānāya
analyzed: evam eva kho ānanda yaḥ maggaḥ yā paṭipadā pañcannam orambhāgiyānam sayojanānam pahānāya

original: taṁ maggaṁ taṁ paṭipadaṁ anāgamma pañcorambhāgiyāni saṁyojanāni ñassati vā dakkhati
analyzed: tam maggam tam paṭipadam an āgamma pañca orambhāgiyāni sayojanāni ñassati vā dakkhati

original: vā pajahissati vāti—netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: vā pajahissati vā atinā itam ṭhānam vijjati

original: Yo ca kho, ānanda, maggo yā paṭipadā pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ pahānāya
analyzed: yaḥ ca kho ānanda maggaḥ yā paṭipadā pañcannam orambhāgiyānam sayojanānam pahānāya

original: taṁ maggaṁ taṁ paṭipadaṁ āgamma pañcorambhāgiyāni saṁyojanāni ñassati vā dakkhati
analyzed: tam maggam tam paṭipadam āgamma pañca orambhāgiyāni sayojanāni ñassati vā dakkhati

original: vā pajahissati vāti—ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: vā pajahissati vā atiṭhānam etam vijjati

original: Seyyathāpi, ānanda, mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato tacaṁ chetvā phegguṁ chetvā sāracchedo bhavissatīti—ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: seyyathā api ānanda mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravataḥ tacam chetvā pheggum chetvā sāra chedaḥ bhavissati iti ṭhānam etam vijjati

original: evameva kho, ānanda, yo maggo yā paṭipadā pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ pahānāya
analyzed: evam eva kho ānanda yaḥ maggaḥ yā paṭipadā pañcannam orambhāgiyānam sayojanānam pahānāya

original: taṁ maggaṁ taṁ paṭipadaṁ āgamma pañcorambhāgiyāni saṁyojanāni ñassati vā dakkhati
analyzed: tam maggam tam paṭipadam āgamma pañca orambhāgiyāni sayojanāni ñassati vā dakkhati

original: vā pajahissati vāti—ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: vā pajahissati vā atiṭhānam etam vijjati

original: Seyyathāpi, ānanda, gaṅgā nadī pūrā udakassa samatittikā kākapeyyā.
analyzed: sā iyyathā api ānanda gaṅgā nadī pūrā udakassa sama tittikā kākapeyyā

original: Atha dubbalako puriso āgaccheyya:
analyzed: atha dubbalakaḥ purisaḥ āgaccheyya

original: ‘ahaṁ imissā gaṅgāya nadiyā tiriyaṁ bāhāya sotaṁ chetvā sotthinā pāraṁ gacchissāmī’ti;
analyzed: aham imissā gaṅgāya nadiyā tiriyam bāhāya sotam chetvā sotthinā pāram gacchissāmi iti

original: so na sakkuṇeyya gaṅgāya nadiyā tiriyaṁ bāhāya sotaṁ chetvā sotthinā pāraṁ gantuṁ.
analyzed: saḥ na gaṅgāya nadiyā tiriyam bāhāya sotam chetvā sotthinā pāram gantu

original: Evameva kho, ānanda, yesaṁ kesañci sakkāyanirodhāya dhamme desiyamāne cittaṁ na pakkhandati nappasīdati na santiṭṭhati na vimuccati;
analyzed: evam eva kho ānanda yesam kesañci sakkāya nirodhāya dhamme desiyamāne cittam na pakkhandati na pasīdati na santiṭṭhati na vimuccati

original: seyyathāpi so dubbalako puriso evamete daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: seyyathā api saḥ dubbalakaḥ purisaḥ evam ete daṭṭhabbā

original: Seyyathāpi, ānanda, gaṅgā nadī pūrā udakassa samatittikā kākapeyyā.
analyzed: sā iyyathā api ānanda gaṅgā nadī pūrā udakassa sama tittikā kākapeyyā

original: Atha balavā puriso āgaccheyya:
analyzed: atha balavā purisaḥ āgaccheyya

original: ‘ahaṁ imissā gaṅgāya nadiyā tiriyaṁ bāhāya sotaṁ chetvā sotthinā pāraṁ gacchissāmī’ti;
analyzed: aham imissā gaṅgāya nadiyā tiriyam bāhāya sotam chetvā sotthinā pāram gacchissāmi iti

original: so sakkuṇeyya gaṅgāya nadiyā tiriyaṁ bāhāya sotaṁ chetvā sotthinā pāraṁ gantuṁ.
analyzed: saḥ sakkuṇeyya gaṅgāya nadiyā tiriyam bāhāya sotam chetvā sotthinā pāram gantu

original: Evameva kho, ānanda, yesaṁ kesañci sakkāyanirodhāya dhamme desiyamāne cittaṁ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati vimuccati;
analyzed: evam eva kho ānanda yesam kesañci sakkāya nirodhāya dhamme desiyamāne cittam pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati vimuccati

original: seyyathāpi so balavā puriso evamete daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: seyyathā api saḥ balavā purisaḥ evam ete daṭṭhabbā

original: Katamo cānanda, maggo, katamā paṭipadā pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ pahānāya?
analyzed: katamaḥ ca ānanda maggo katamā paṭipadā pañcannam orambhāgiyānam sayojanānam pahānāya

original: Idhānanda, bhikkhu upadhivivekā akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānā sabbaso kāyaduṭṭhullānaṁ
analyzed: idha ānanda bhikkhu upadhi vivekā akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānā sabbaso

original: paṭippassaddhiyā vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ
analyzed: paṭippassaddhiyāḥ vivicca iva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi sa vitakkam sa vicāra

original: vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: viveka jam pīti sukham paṭhamam jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: So yadeva tattha hoti rūpagataṁ vedanāgataṁ saññāgataṁ saṅkhāragataṁ viññāṇagataṁ
analyzed: saḥ yat eva tattha hoti rūpa gatam vedanā gatam saññā gatam saṅkhāra gatam viññāṇa gatam

original: te dhamme aniccato dukkhato rogato gaṇḍato sallato aghato ābādhato parato palokato
analyzed: te dhamme aniccataḥ dukkhataḥ rogataḥ gaṇḍataḥ sallataḥ aghataḥ ābādhataḥ paratas palokataḥ

original: suññato anattato samanupassati.
analyzed: suññataḥ anattataḥ samanupassati

original: So tehi dhammehi cittaṁ paṭivāpeti.
analyzed: saḥ tehi dhammehi cittam paṭivāpeti

original: So tehi dhammehi cittaṁ paṭivāpetvā amatāya dhātuyā cittaṁ upasaṁharati:
analyzed: saḥ tehi dhammehi cittam paṭivāpetvā amatāya dhātuyā cittam upasaharati

original: ‘etaṁ santaṁ etaṁ paṇītaṁ yadidaṁ sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhākkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānan’ti.
analyzed: etam santam etam paṇītam yat idam sabba saṅkhāra samatho sabba upadhi paṭinissaggo taṇhā kkhayaḥ virāgaḥ nirodhaḥ nibbānam ti

original: So tattha ṭhito āsavānaṁ khayaṁ pāpuṇāti;
analyzed: saḥ tattha ṭhitaḥ āsavānam khayam pāpuṇāti

original: no ce āsavānaṁ khayaṁ pāpuṇāti teneva dhammarāgena tāya dhammanandiyā pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ
analyzed: no ce āsavānam khayam pāpuṇāti tena iva dhamma rāgena tāya dhamma nandiyā

original: saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā opapātiko hoti, tattha parinibbāyī, anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā.
analyzed: sayojanānam parikkhayā opapātikaḥ hoti tattha parinibbāyī an āvatti dhammo tasmā lokā

original: Ayampi kho, ānanda, maggo ayaṁ paṭipadā pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ pahānāya.
analyzed: ayam pi kho ānanda maggaḥ ayam paṭipadā pañcannam orambhāgiyānam sayojanānam pahānāya

original: Puna caparaṁ, ānanda, bhikkhu vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā …pe… dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati …pe…
analyzed: puna caparaḥ ānanda bhikkhu vitakka vicārānam vūpasamā pe dutiyam jhānam upasampajja viharati pe

original: tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ …pe…
analyzed: tatiyam jhānam

original: catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: catuttham jhānam upasampajja viharati

analyzed: so yat eva tattha hoti rūpa gatam vedanā gatam saññā gatam saṅkhāra gatam viññāṇa gatam

original: pe…
analyzed: pe

original: anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā.
analyzed: an āvatti dhammaḥ tasmā lokā

original: Ayampi kho, ānanda, maggo ayaṁ paṭipadā pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ pahānāya.
analyzed: ayam pi kho ānanda maggaḥ ayam paṭipadā pañcannam orambhāgiyānam sayojanānam pahānāya

original: Puna caparaṁ, ānanda, bhikkhu sabbaso rūpasaññānaṁ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṁ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṁ amanasikārā ‘ananto ākāso’ti ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: puna caparaḥ ānanda bhikkhu sabbaso rūpa saññānam samatikkamā paṭigha saññānam atthaṅgamā nānatta saññānam amanasikārā anantaḥ ākāsaḥ iti ākāsānañcāyatanam upasampajja viharati

original: So yadeva tattha hoti vedanāgataṁ saññāgataṁ saṅkhāragataṁ viññāṇagataṁ …
analyzed: so yat eva tattha hoti vedanā gatam saññā gatam saṅkhāra gatam viññāṇa gatam

original: pe…
analyzed: pe

original: anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā.
analyzed: an āvatti dhammaḥ tasmā lokā

original: Ayampi kho, ānanda, maggo ayaṁ paṭipadā pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ pahānāya.
analyzed: ayam pi kho ānanda maggaḥ ayam paṭipadā pañcannam orambhāgiyānam sayojanānam pahānāya

original: Puna caparaṁ, ānanda, bhikkhu sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘anantaṁ viññāṇan’ti viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: puna caparaḥ ānanda bhikkhu sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanam samatikkamma anantam viññāṇanti viññāṇañcāyatanam upasampajja viharati

original: So yadeva tattha hoti vedanāgataṁ saññāgataṁ saṅkhāragataṁ viññāṇagataṁ …
analyzed: so yat eva tattha hoti vedanā gatam saññā gatam saṅkhāra gatam viññāṇa gatam

original: pe…
analyzed: pe

original: anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā.
analyzed: an āvatti dhammaḥ tasmā lokā

original: Ayampi kho, ānanda, maggo ayaṁ paṭipadā pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ pahānāya.
analyzed: ayam pi kho ānanda maggaḥ ayam paṭipadā pañcannam orambhāgiyānam sayojanānam pahānāya

original: Puna caparaṁ, ānanda, bhikkhu sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘natthi kiñcī’ti ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: puna caparaḥ ānanda bhikkhu sabbasas viññāṇañca āyatanam samatikkamma na atthi kiñci iti ākiñcaññāyatanam upasampajja viharati

original: So yadeva tattha hoti vedanāgataṁ saññāgataṁ saṅkhāragataṁ viññāṇagataṁ …

original: pe…
analyzed: pe

original: anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā.
analyzed: an āvatti dhammaḥ tasmā lokā

original: Ayampi kho, ānanda, maggo ayaṁ paṭipadā pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ pahānāyā”ti.
analyzed: ayam pi kho ānanda maggaḥ ayam paṭipadā pañcannam orambhāgiyānam sayojanānam pahānāya ati

original: “Eso ce, bhante, maggo esā paṭipadā pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ pahānāya, atha kiñcarahi idhekacce bhikkhū cetovimuttino ekacce bhikkhū paññāvimuttino”ti?
analyzed: eso ce bhante maggaḥ esā paṭipadā pañcannam orambhāgiyānam sayojanānam pahānāya atha kiñcarahi idha ekacce bhikkhū cetaḥ vimuttinaḥ ekacce bhikkhū paññā vimuttinaḥ ti

original: “Ettha kho panesāhaṁ, ānanda, indriyavemattataṁ vadāmī”ti.
analyzed: ettha khalu pana isā aha ānandaḥ indriya vemattatam vadāmi iti

original: Idamavoca bhagavā.
analyzed: idam avoca bhagavān

original: Attamano āyasmā ānando bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandīti.
analyzed: āyasmai ānandaḥ bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandi iti

original: Mahāmālukyasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ catutthaṁ.
analyzed: mahāmālukyasuttam niṭṭhitam catuttha
